Reviews.Title: “Good for a budget...”
Reviews.Author: Veritiserum
Reviews.Content: booked hotel mainly price location cheap found reasonable walking distance cloud gate magnificent mile etc pay extremely outdated smallthere maybe 3 inches space wall bed except front bathroom oldthe carpet bedding 60s 70s didnt chicago stay hoteli sleep served purpose clean youre claustrophobic amenities handle walking miles suggest upgrade otherwise decent price

Reviews.Content: terrible booked nights hardly stayed night front desk rude professional hotel clean dirty mold stains 1 english channel tv tv 100 oldand 3 foreign channels cold couple medium size towels bathroom coffee bad overall

Reviews.Title: “Convenient budget choice”
Reviews.Author: Tiger W
Reviews.Content: location chinatown hotel close loop public transportation easily accessible red line train stop minutes restaurants close makes dining easy staff friendly helpful course shouldnt expecting luxurious stay price unbeatable

Reviews.Title: “Passable budget option”
Reviews.Author: lsilver3
Reviews.Content: husband looking inexpensive accommodations chicago attending concert evening didnt drive hours home immediately chose chinatown hotel price 80 taxes included cheap parking 10 24 hours location stops red line loop neighborhood safe truly excellent eat steps hotel hotel dreary basic perfectly fine overnight stay terrible smell brought dog alerted front desk immediately changed

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights reminded real flophouse stayed miami december 1977 operators chinatown hotel minimum little else rented suite friend experienced traveler surprised truly laughable cabinets broken falling apart holding telephone collapsing bed tilted floor easier entry door friends accomodations 1000 night hotel chinatown location cheap cafes abound stop blocks final comment doubt lock inside additional locking system swinging bar closes metal stem due loose screws bar placed unto stem space insert tool push bar hotel bad joke course customer taking seriously told priceline inspect property

Reviews.Content: people idiots couldnt stay night cant judge booked online arrived late 20 hr day corporate event production downtown speaking night clerk driving 15 hours looking parking 1 mile joke hotel found driving ford excursion suv crew equipment transpo absolutely park hotel miles stay hotel refused refund nights stay absolutely unfair considering circumstances advertise 10 parking available planned terrible don stay unless surround yourself idiots boost ego intelligence means stay feel liek smartest person world

Reviews.Title: “No, but.......”
Reviews.Author: SouthCarolinaMax
Reviews.Content: stars close downtown easy public transportation access course restaurants outside door mexican neighborhood 18th st short distance dont try walking chicago tough hotel town budget account chinatown hotel reading reviews laugh broken furniture sitting suite ancient tvs bath clean functional beds comfortable bites smelled musty carpeting hotel desperately cleaned replaced sense humor intestinal hopefully hotel base operations survive

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for.”
Reviews.Author: lboogie4444
Reviews.Content: chicago week looking sleep night planning daythis stories elevators clean cant beat location 1 block chinatown redline stop loop access trains time served purpose communal refrigerator microwave computer downstairs coffee makers coffee bring own

Reviews.Title: “A memorable stay”
Reviews.Author: avdtravelers
Reviews.Content: booked hotel advance website excellent spend weekend exploring chicago lucked finding free parking street block hotel service acceptable location excellent enjoyed close train downtown able enjoy ambiance china town cuisine restaurant stay paper thin walls scratchy horse blanket bed appeared photos stair narrow difficult handle luggage suited left memories talking

Reviews.Title: “Good Basic Room”
Reviews.Author: boodleman
Reviews.Content: stayed chinatown hotel 2nights frisat downtown business trip pleased neighborhood location proximity cta station excellent bakery corner hotel clean comfortable fancy perfectly acceptable accessible definitely stay future short visits chicago

Reviews.Title: “Somewhat Exotic, Very Basic”
Reviews.Author: cmb53703
Reviews.Content: reserved sometime ago weekend taste chicago expecting simple basic accomodations thats precisely location short excellent el stop blocks absolutely amazing restaurants nearby sum described fairly exotic version motel 6 youre looking basic set accomodations thats convenient super deal youre looking pampered impress special life youre definetly barking wrong tree
